Question
========
(16) A dan B saling lepas dengan P(A)=1/3 dan P(B)=1/6. Hitung P(A ∪ B).

Answerlist
----------
* 1/2
* 1/3
* 1/6
* 2/3

Solution
========
Saling lepas ⇒ P(A ∪ B)=1/3+1/6=1/2.
